In England, in the seven days to 12 March, there were 33,035 new confirmed cases (58.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 March, there were 34,410 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 4% (1,375 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 March is 3,741,067 (6,646.4 cases per 100,000 population).
